#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Text=Prior to publication of Scientology - Abuse at the Top by Amy Scobee , the author was threatened with separate legal actions – by lawyer Bertram Fields representing influential Scientology member and celebrity , actor Tom Cruise ; and Scientology representative Tommy Davis on behalf of Scientology management .
#Text=Image : Amy Scobee .
#Text=AS
#Text=: Bertram Fields made a mistake by issuing that legal threat when he had n't even read my book to know what I actually said about his client .
#Text=He made assumptions based on hearsay .
#Text=When I received the letter , I thought that it was just like Scientology – issue threats to intimidate and back someone off .
#Text=I was n't going to back off because what I wrote in my book was true .
#Text=I am the one who did the project to hire Scientologists for Tom 's household .
#Text=I am the one Shelly Miscavige told what disqualifying drugs Tom took so he could not qualify for the Sea Organization – which he supposedly wanted to join .
#Text=I did n't say anything in my book about Cruise having to decide between Nicole or the organization .

#Text=So , I knew that it was an attempt to prevent me from putting out my book as " little ' ol me " could never possibly stand up to the high-powered lawyer of an A-list celebrity who has millions of dollars at his disposal .
#Text=But the fact is – it did n't phase me as truth is truth and I 'm willing to stand up for the truth .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )
#Text=The book was subsequently published and made publicly available .
#Text=At this point in time , has there been any follow-up from Tom Cruise , his lawyer , or representatives , to you ?
#Text=How do you feel about your legal standing if Cruise were to escalate the matter beyond the initial legal threat letter ?
#Text=AS
#Text=: None , whatsoever and I highly doubt they would follow through with any lawsuit because what I stated in my book is truth .
#Text=It 's what I did myself .
#Text=It 's what I witnessed myself .
#Text=What I reported in my book can be backed up with evidence and several witnesses – easily .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )
#Text=The month your book was published , the New York Daily News reported that Scientology organization public representative Tommy Davis characterized your accounts as " fiction " .

#Text=With regards to assertions you made that David Miscavige and Scientology officials " snooped " in the confessional folders of Scientology members and particularly celebrities , Davis stated , " Nobody in the church has ever violated the priest-penitent privilege . ... [ Confessional files ] are held in the strictest confidence .
